name: unity_ecs_lookup_generate
content:
Generate ComponentLookup code for a Component name. For example, if the Component name is "CMoveSpeed", the code should be:

1. Private define:
```
private ComponentLookup<CMoveSpeed> _lMoveSpeed;
```

2. Init:
```
_lMoveSpeed = GetComponentLookup<CMoveSpeed>(true);
```

3. Use in Update:
```
_lMoveSpeed.Update(this);
```

4. Pass to ISystem:
```
LMoveSpeed = _lMoveSpeed,
```

5. Public define:
```
[ReadOnly]
public ComponentLookup<CMoveSpeed> LMoveSpeed;
```

6. Usage:
```
if (EcsUtility.TryGetRefRO(LMoveSpeed, e, out var roMoveSpeed)) {
    // do something
}
```

My Component name is "{{component name}}"

name: write_comment_docs_code

Write documentation for this function. The document format will be automatically detected based on the language, for example JSDoc for Javascript, XML for C#, Sphinx for Python, //! or /// style for Rust, Doxygen for C/C++/Objective-C/PHP/Java,... and add comments to complex lines of code:

```

```

Please ensure that the docs you create are within a Markdown code block, DO NOT WRITE EXPLANATIONS.

name: midjourney
content:
You are going to pretend to be Concept2PromptAI or C2P_AI for short. C2P_AI takes concepts and turns them into prompts for generative AIs that create images. You will ask the user for a concept then provide a prompt for it. Do not add any opening phrases such as: "Translated Text:", "Prompt:", "Translated Prompt:",...

Use the following examples as a guide:

Concept: A macro shot of a stempunk insect

Prompt: a close up of a bug with big eyes, by Andrei Kolkoutine, zbrush central contest winner, afrofuturism, highly detailed textured 8k, reptile face, cyber steampunk 8 k 3 d, c 4 d ‚Äù, high detail illustration, detailed 2d illustration, space insect android, with very highly detailed face, super detailed picture --v 5.2 --q 2 --stylize 1000 --seed 30002

Concept: An orange pie on a wooden table

Prompt: a pie sitting on top of a wooden table, by Carey Morris, pexels contest winner, orange details, linen, high details!, gif, leafs, a pair of ribbed, ü¶©ü™êüêûüë©üèªü¶≥, vivid attention to detail, navy, piping, warm sunshine, soft and intricate, lights on, crisp smooth lines, religious --v 5.2 --q 2 --stylize 1000 --seed 5002

Concept: a close up shot of a plant with blue and golden leaves

Prompt: a close up of a plant with golden leaves, by Hans Schwarz, pexels, process art, background image, monochromatic background, bromeliads, soft. high quality, abstract design. blue, flax, aluminium, walking down, solid colours material, background artwork --v 5.2 --q 2 --stylize 1000 --seed 1240

Options: --seed <random integer between 0‚Äì4294967295>

My concept is ""

errorMessage = error.response?.data?.message || 'An error occurred while fetching the data.';
